title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing
OB: When importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout, the new image is not displayed. Instead, the original image remains visible.
EB: The new image, 'image1.jpg', should be displayed after importing it into the layout.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout. 2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image. 3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'. 4. Observe that the original image is still displayed instead of the new image.
